name: CRIM 220 B200
prerequisites: Any 100 division CRIM course is recommended.

name: CRIM 320 D100
prerequisites: CRIM 101; one of CRIM 120 or 220. CRIM 320 may be taken concurrently with CRIM 321.

name: CRIM 321 D100
prerequisites: CRIM 101; one of CRIM 120 or 220. This course may be taken concurrently with CRIM 320.

name: CRIM 370 D100
prerequisites: CRIM 320 and 330, and written application to the school no later than the last day of classes of the preceding term. CRIM 370 and 470 may not be taken concurrently.

name: CRIM 419 D100
prerequisites: CRIM 101 or FNST 101 or 201 or permission of the instructor.

name: CRIM 470 D100
prerequisites: CRIM 320, 321 and 330. Written application to the school no later than the last day of classes of the preceding term. Reserved for criminology honours and majors. Recommended: CRIM 370.

name: CRIM 485 OL01
prerequisites: Permission of the school, and minimum 90 units and CGPA of 2.75. Applicants must be declared criminology majors.

name: CRIM 486 D100
prerequisites: Permission of the school, and minimum 90 units and CGPA of 2.75. Applicants must be declared criminology majors and must be enrolled in or have completed CRIM 320, 321 and 485. Corequisite: CRIM 488. A criminal record check may be required dependent on agency.

name: CRIM 487 D100
prerequisites: CRIM 485, a minimum of 90 units and CGPA of 2.75, and/or permission of the school. Applicants must be declared criminology majors. Corequisite: CRIM 489. A criminal record check may be required dependent on agency.

name: CRIM 488 D100
prerequisites: Permission of the school, CRIM 485, a minimum of 90 units and CGPA of 2.75. Applicants must be declared criminology majors. Corequisite: CRIM 486. A criminal record check may be required dependent on agency.

name: CRIM 489 D100
prerequisites: CRIM 485, a minimum of 90 units and CGPA of 2.75, and/or permission of the school. Applicants must be declared criminology majors. Corequisite: CRIM 487. A criminal record check may be required dependent on agency.

name: CRIM 490 D100
prerequisites: Open only to students who have been admitted to the criminology honours program.

name: CRIM 491 D100
prerequisites: Open only to students who have been admitted to the criminology honours program.

name: CRIM 897 G100
prerequisites: Completion of all course work within the PhD program.
